类 IndexFeatures

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.indexing.IndexFeatures
public class IndexFeatures
extends Object
Characterizes the features that a particular IndexProvider implementation supports
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
